sys_update_version.name: x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_28582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>copyARecord: Call this function to make a copy of a specific record.</name><number>SCRIPT0001063</number><script><![CDATA[function copyARecord(record) {
	var recordElement;
	var recordElementName;
	var recordTable = record.getTableName();
	var recordFields = record.getFields();
	var newRecord = new GlideRecord(recordTable);
	newRecord.initialize();
	for (var i = 0; i < recordFields.size(); i++) {
		recordElement = recordFields.get(i);
		if(recordElement.getName() != 'sys_id' && recordElement.getName() != 'number')
		{
			recordElementName = recordElement.getName();
			newRecord.setValue(recordElementName, record.getValue(recordElementName));
		}
	}
	var newSysId = newRecord.insert();
	return newRecord;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>28582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>copyARecord: Call this function to make a copy of a specific record.</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_28582467072739105295f19d7c1ed0b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:51:12</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
